title: Google Analytics C# boilerplate
author: osullivj
content: readme.md google analytics c# boilerplategoogle setup'll need google service email address a p12 key file set key email variables below. tohttps://console.developers.google.com/iam-admin create service account. the options menu create p12key ( a json key). log to analytics.google.com use admin/user management add service emailaddress read & analyze permissions.buildganalytics.csproj packages.config target .net framework 4. out bin/debug/ganalytics.exe.config: fixes system.net.http.primitivesreference version error. 'll need do nuget install packages.config the packages subdirectory. build run! luck!acknowledgementsadapted logan g'sexcellent stackoverflow answer.
